ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: *grin* Enchanters have been complaining recently about this for their whole Illusion series of spells. That we have a whole line that is just a toy now that
ygData.messageBody:
*grin* Enchanters have been complaining recently about this for their whole
Illusion series of spells. That we have a whole line that is just a "toy"
now that they have changed the way it affects faction.

Also, though, what might be affecting you is that they can see through
illusion to your religion.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kirk Baptista [mailto:dopey@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 12:18 AM
>To: ''eqbards@onelist.com' '
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>
>From: Kirk Baptista <dopey@...>
>
>I have noticed that the Dark Elf illusion does not have any effect on
>faction, is this correct?
>
>I though the whole reason for it was so that people would think you're a
>dark elf, and treat you accordingly. But, I seem to still be KOS in
>Nektulos, etc. and he dark elf merchies in South Ro still won't
>sell to me.
>
>So it seems to me that the illusion is pretty much just a toy, with no real
>value. Good thing it has good stat boosts otherwise.
>
>Am I missing something?
>
>Aranlas Starchaser
>Lone Elf of Kelethin
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Tatsukawa
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Sent: 2/2/00 4:02 PM
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>
>
>Ah. Well that would be annoying, fortunately for me, I don't use that
>song
>all that often in any dark area that I've travelled. :-)
>
>But yes, I could see why the Psalm's UV effect would overwrite the masks
>effect. This is pretty much par for the course though with bard songs,
>as
>they do conflict with a number of other buffs as well.
>
>I wonder if this is intentional or just one of those bugs?
>
>---Windleaf
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Mike Roach [mailto:mike.roach@...]
>> Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 7:57 AM
>> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>>
>>
>> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>>
>> Its not accelerando (or any other song as far as I can tell)
>> that cancels
>> out the UV, its Psalm of Warmth.
>>
>> Psalm of Warmth has cold resist + damage shield + UV affect.
>> When the song
>> pulses the UV affect overrides the affect from the mask so
>> that when you
>> stop singing it you no longer have UV. Stop all songs and
>> right click your
>> Mask again and the UV will return.
>>
>> -Faras
>>
>>
>>

>> > it. I get the

>> > accelerando.
>> > Still had the blue tinge.
>> >
>> > So it works fine for me as well.
>> >
>> > Windleaf, 28th level balladeer, Half Elf, Bertox.
